name: Market
description: A bustling marketplace where traders and merchants gather to buy and sell goods.
initialState: Busy market stalls with vendors calling out their wares.

name: Tavern
description: A warm gathering place where travelers can rest and locals share news.
initialState: Cozy tavern with flickering candlelight and comfortable seating.

name: Workshop
description: A skilled craftsman's workshop where equipment is commissioned and repaired.
initialState: Well-equipped workshop with tools and materials for crafting.

name: Logging Camp
description: A forest camp where loggers harvest timber and gather forest resources.
initialState: Active logging site with timber stacks and forest workers.

name: Tavern
description: A rustic tavern where forest workers gather to rest and share stories.
initialState: Rough-hewn tavern with the smell of wood smoke and ale.

name: Market
description: A large trading market where goods from multiple regions are bought and sold.
initialState: Busy trading hub with merchants from across the region.

name: Workshop

name: Dock
description: A waterfront dock where fish are brought in and water transport is arranged.
initialState: Busy dock with boats, nets, and the fresh smell of river water.
